New Records: Stephen Curry recorded 13 points, 8 rebounds, and 5 assists, with three 3-pointers in the win.
Draymond Green had 13 points, 8 rebounds, and 7 assists before his ejection due to two technical fouls.
Key Match Events: Draymond Green was ejected with two technical fouls in a 33-second span.
The Warriors won two challenges during the game, including a foul call against Jake LaRavia.
Pre-Game Insights: Stephen Curry had a slow start, missing his first three shots and not scoring until a 3-pointer at 2:40 of the second quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: The Golden State Warriors won the game despite a slow start from Stephen Curry.
Ja Morant is undergoing imaging for his injured hip and pelvis area, with coach Taylor Jenkins noting he is eager to return.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Golden State Warriors forward Lindy Waters III hyperextended his left knee after blocking a shot.
The game saw physicality and a competitive atmosphere throughout.
